original_text: After this, Jesus visited many places in Galilee. He did not want to visit Judea because the Jewish leaders there wanted to kill him.
korean_text: 그 후에 예수께서 갈릴리에서 다니시고 유대에서 다니려 아니하심은 유대인들이 죽이려 함이러라

sentences.original_text: After this, Jesus visited many places
sentences.korean_translation: 이 후에 예수님은 많은 곳을 방문하셨다

sentences.original_text: He did not want to visit Judea
